title: JSON schema for the reachability metadata used by GraalVM Native Image

comment.title: Comment(s) applying to the whole file (e.g., generation date, author, etc.)

reflection.title: Metadata to ensure elements are accessible via reflection

items.title: Elements that should be registered for reflection for a specified type

type.title: Type descriptor of the class that should be registered for reflection

methods.title: List of methods that should be registered for the type declared in <type>

items.title: Method descriptor of the method that should be registered for reflection

fields.title: List of class fields that can be read or written to for the type declared in <type>

items.title: Field descriptor of the field that should be registered for reflection

name.title: Name of the field that should be registered for reflection

allDeclaredMethods.title: Register all declared methods from the type for reflective invocation

allDeclaredFields.title: Register all declared fields from the type for reflective access

allDeclaredConstructors.title: Register all declared constructors from the type for reflective invocation

allPublicMethods.title: Register all public methods from the type for reflective invocation

allPublicFields.title: Register all public fields from the type for reflective access

allPublicConstructors.title: Register all public constructors from the type for reflective invocation

unsafeAllocated.title: Allow objects of this class to be instantiated with a call to jdk.internal.misc.Unsafe#allocateInstance or JNI's AllocObject

serializable.title: Allow objects of this class to be serialized and deserialized

jniAccessible.title: Register the type, including all registered fields and methods, for runtime JNI access

resources.title: Metadata to ensure resources are accessible

glob.title: Resource name or pattern matching multiple resources (accepts * and ** wildcards)

oneOf.title: Resource bundle that should be available

returnType.title: Memory layout definition (allows canonical layouts; see `java.lang.foreign.Linker`)

items.title: Memory layout definition (allows canonical layouts; see `java.lang.foreign.Linker`)

parameterTypes.title: List of the function descriptor's parameter types

captureCallState.title: Specifies whether a call state should be captured. The specific states to capture are determined at run time. See also: `java.lang.foreign.Linker.Option.captureCallState`

items.title: Function descriptor to be registered for a downcall

downcalls.title: List of function descriptors that should be registered for downcalls

returnType.title: Memory layout definition (allows canonical layouts; see `java.lang.foreign.Linker`)

items.title: Memory layout definition (allows canonical layouts; see `java.lang.foreign.Linker`)

parameterTypes.title: List of the function descriptor's parameter types

options.title: Linker options (see `java.lang.foreign.Linker.Option`)
options.description: Currently, no linker options are allowed for upcalls. This may change in the future.

items.title: Function descriptor to be registered for an upcall

upcalls.title: List of function descriptors that should be registered for upcalls

returnType.title: Memory layout definition (allows canonical layouts; see `java.lang.foreign.Linker`)

items.title: Memory layout definition (allows canonical layouts; see `java.lang.foreign.Linker`)

parameterTypes.title: List of the function descriptor's parameter types

options.title: Linker options (see `java.lang.foreign.Linker.Option`)
options.description: Currently, no linker options are allowed for direct upcalls. This may change in the future.

items.title: Java method and function descriptor to be registered for a direct upcall

directUpcalls.title: List of Java methods and function descriptors that should be registered for direct upcalls

foreign.title: JSON schema for the FFM API configuration used by GraalVM Native Image
foreign.description: For a description and examples of writing an FFM API configuration, see: https://github.com/oracle/graal/blob/master/docs/reference-manual/native-image/FFM-API.md

reason.title: Reason(s) for including this element (e.g., needed for establishing connections, or needed by method X#Y for task Z)

condition.title: Condition used to determine if the element will be accessible at run time

typeReached.title: Type descriptor of a class that must be reached in order to allow access to the element

type.title: Type descriptors used by GraalVM Native Image metadata files

proxy.title: A list of interfaces defining the proxy class

items.title: Fully-qualified name of the interface defining the proxy class

declaringClass.title: The class in which the lambda class is defined

declaringMethod.title: The method in which the lambda class is defined

interfaces.title: Non-empty list of interfaces implemented by the lambda class

items.title: Fully-qualified name of the interface implemented by the lambda class

method.title: Method descriptors used by GraalVM Native Image metadata files

name.title: Method name that should be registered for this class

items.title: List of the method's parameter types
